https://azure.microsoft.com/services/kubernetes-service/ - Service](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/kubernetes-service/) - Managed Kubernetes service, free cluster management

https://www.ibm.com/cloud/free/ -
https://www.brainboard.co - Collaborative solution to visually build and manage cloud infrastructures from end-to-end.
https://www.pulumi.com/ - Modern infrastructure as code platform that allows you to use familiar programming languages and tools to build, deploy, and manage cloud infrastructure.
https://www.terraform.io/ - Terraform Cloud. Free remote state management and team collaboration for teams up to 5 users.
https://bitbucket.org/ - Unlimited public and private Git repos for up to 5 users with Pipelines for CI/CD
https://chiselapp.com/ - Unlimited public and private Fossil repositories
https://www.codebasehq.com/ - One free project with 100 MB space and 2 users
https://codeberg.page/ - Unlimited public and private Git repos for free and open-source projects. Static website hosting with [Codeberg Pages](https://codeberg.page/).
https://gitgud.io - Unlimited private and public repositories. Free forever. Powered by GitLab & Sapphire. CI/CD not provided.
https://github.com/) — Unlimited public repositories and unlimited private repositories (with unlimited collaborators). Apart from this some other free services(there are much more but we list the main ones here - Unlimited public repositories and unlimited private repositories (with unlimited collaborators). Apart from this some other free services(there are much more but we list the main ones here) provided are :
https://github.com/features/actions)(Free for Public Repos, 2000 min/month for private repos free - Public Repos, 2000 min/month for private repos free)
https://github.com/codespaces - Development environments that are hosted in the cloud. 120-core hours and 15 GB codespaces storage available for free every month.
https://pages.github.com) (Free for Public Repos - Hosting](https://pages.github.com) (Free for Public Repos)
https://github.com/features/packages) (Free for public repos,500 MB storage & 1GB bandwidth outside CI/CD free for private repos - & Container Registry](https://github.com/features/packages) (Free for public repos,500 MB storage & 1GB bandwidth outside CI/CD free for private repos)
https://about.gitlab.com/ - Unlimited public and private Git repos with up to 5 collaborators. Also offers the following features :
https://about.gitlab.com/product/continuous-integration) (Free for Public Repos, 400 mins/month for private repos - for Public Repos, 400 mins/month for private repos)
https://about.gitlab.com/product/pages - with [GitLab Pages](https://about.gitlab.com/product/pages).
https://foss.heptapod.net/ - Heptapod is a friendly fork of GitLab Community Edition providing support for Mercurial
https://ionicframework.com/appflow - Repo and tools to develop applications with Ionic, also you have an ionic repo
https://notabug.org - NotABug.org is a free-software code collaboration platform for freely licensed projects, Git-based
https://osdn.net/ - OSDN.net is a free-of-charge service for open source software developers, offering SVN/Git/Mercurial/Bazaar/CVS repositories and more.
https://pagure.io - Pagure.io is a free and open source software code collaboration platform for FOSS-licensed projects, Git-based
https://www.perforce.com/products/helix-teamhub - Free 1GB Cloud and Git, Mercurial, or SVN repositories.
https://pijul.com/ - Unlimited free and open source distributed version control system. Its distinctive feature is to be based on a sound theory of patches, which makes it easy to learn and use, and really distributed. Solves many problems of git/hg/svn/darcs.
https://plasticscm.com/ - Free for individuals, OSS and nonprofit organizations
https://projectlocker.com) — One free private project (Git and Subversion - One free private project (Git and Subversion) with 50 MB space
https://rocketgit.com - Repository Hosting based on Git. Unlimited Public & Private repositories.
https://savannah.gnu.org/) - Serves as a collaborative software development management system for free Software projects (for GNU Projects - Serves as a collaborative software development management system for free Software projects (for GNU Projects)
https://savannah.nongnu.org/) - Serves as a collaborative software development management system for free Software projects (for non-GNU projects - Serves as a collaborative software development management system for free Software projects (for non-GNU projects)
https://ip.city - 100 free IP geolocation requests per day
https://a11ywatch.com - Powerful web accessibility tool at scale. Free site-wide web acessibility testing and beyond that resets daily.
https://www.abstractapi.com - — API suite for a variety of use cases including IP geolocation, gender detection or even email validation.
https://algorithmia.com/ - Host algorithms for free. Includes free monthly allowance for running algorithms. Now with CLI support.
https://www.apify.com/ - Web scraping and automation platform to create an API for any website and extract data. Ready-made scrapers, integrated proxies, and custom solutions. Free plan with $5 platform credits included every month.
https://apimocha.com - - Completely free online API mocking for testing and prototyping. Make up to 500 requests per day, fully customizable API responses, download mock rules as a Postman collection.
https://apitemplate.io - Auto-generate images and PDF documents with a simple API or automation tools like Zapier & Airtable. No CSS/HTML required. Free plan comes with 50 images/month and 3 templates.
https://arize.com/ - - Machine learning observability for model monitoring and root-causing issues such as data quality and performance drift. Free up to two models.
https://atlastk.org/ - - Lightweight library to develop single-page web applications that are instantly accessible. Available for Java, Node.js, Perl, Python and Ruby.
https://beeceptor.com) - Mock a rest API in seconds, fake API response and much more. Free 50 requests per day, public dashboard, open endpoints (anyone having link to the dashboard can view requests and responses - Mock a rest API in seconds, fake API response and much more. Free 50 requests per day, public dashboard, open endpoints (anyone having link to the dashboard can view requests and responses).
https://bigml.com/ - Hosted machine learning algorithms. Unlimited free tasks for development, limit of 16 MB data/task.
https://bruzu.com/ - Automate Image production. Generate tons of Image variants with API, Integrations or nocode sheet. API is FREE with watermark.
https://calendarific.com - Enterprise-grade Public holiday API service for over 200 countries. Free plan includes 1000 calls per month.
https://www.clarifai.com - Image API for custom face recognition and detection. Able to train AI models. Free plan has 5000 calls per month.
https://cloudmersive.com/ - Utility API platform with full access to expansive API Library including Document Conversion, Virus Scanning, and more with 800 calls/month.
https://colab.research.google.com - Free web-based Python notebook environment with Nvidia Tesla K80 GPU.
https://collect2.com - Create an API endpoint to test, automate, and connect webhooks. Free plan allows for two datasets, 2000 records, 1 forwarder, and 1 alert.
https://conversiontools.io/) - Online File Converter for documents, images, video, audio, eBooks. REST API is available. Libraries for Node.js, PHP, Python. Support files up to 50 GB (for paid plans - - Online File Converter for documents, images, video, audio, eBooks. REST API is available. Libraries for Node.js, PHP, Python. Support files up to 50 GB (for paid plans). Free tier is limited by file size and number of conversions per day.
https://www.coupler.io/ - Data integration tool that syncs between apps. It can create live dashboards and reports, transform and manipulate values, collect and back up insights. The free plan has unlimited users, 100 runs with 1000 rows a month and unlimited integrations.
https://craftmypdf.com - Auto-Generate PDF documents from reusable templates with a drop-and-drop editor and a simple API. Free plan comes with 100 PDFs/month and 3 templates.
https://curlhub.io - Proxy service for inspecting and debugging API calls. Free plan includes 10,000 requests per month.
https://currencyscoop.com - Realtime currency data API for fintech apps. Free plan includes 5000 calls per month.
https://cube.dev/ - Cube helps data engineers and application developers access data from modern data stores, organize it into consistent definitions, and deliver it to every application. The fastest way to use Cube is with Cube Cloud, which has a free-tier with 1GB of data pass through each month.
https://datafetcher.com - - Connect Airtable to any application or API with no-code. Postman-like interface for running API requests in Airtable. Pre-built integrations with dozens of apps. The free plan includes 100 runs per month.
https://www.dataimporter.io - Tool for connecting, cleaning, and importing data into Salesforce. Free Plan includes up to 20,000 records per month.
https://datalore.jetbrains.com - Python notebooks by Jetbrains. Includes 10 GB of storage and 120 hours of runtime each month.
https://dataminer.io/) - A browser extension (Google Chrome, MS Edge - - A browser extension (Google Chrome, MS Edge) for data extraction from web pages CSV or Excel. The free plan gives you 500 pages/month.
https://datapane.com - API for building interactive reports in Python and deploying Python scripts and Jupyter Notebooks as self-service tools.
https://db-ip.com/api/free - Free IP geolocation API with 1k request per IP per day.lite database under CC-BY 4.0 License is free too.
https://www.dbdesigner.net/ - — Cloud based Database schema design and modeling tool with a free starter plan of 2 Database models and 10 tables per model.
https://developer.deepar.ai) — Augmented reality face filters for any platform with one SDK. Free plan provides up to 10 monthly active users (MAU - Augmented reality face filters for any platform with one SDK. Free plan provides up to 10 monthly active users (MAU) and tracking up to 4 faces
https://deepnote.com - A new kind of data science notebook. Jupyter-compatible with real-time collaboration and running in the cloud. Free tier includes unlimited personal projects, up to 750 hours of standard hardware and teams with up to 3 editors.
https://www.diggernaut.com/ - Cloud based web scraping and data extraction platform for turning any website to the dataset or to work with it as with an API. Free plan includes 5K page requests monthly.
https://disease.sh/ - A free API providing accurate data for building the Covid-19 related useful Apps.
https://dreamfactory.com/ - Open source REST API backend for mobile, web, and IoT applications. Hook up any SQL/NoSQL database, file storage system, or external service and it instantly creates a comprehensive REST API platform with live documentation, user management,...
https://advicement.io - Generate PDF documents with JSON to PDF API based on LaTeX templates. Free plan allows 50 API calls per month and access to a library of templates.
https://dynapictures.com - Design automation tool which lets you dynamically generate images over REST API. Change colors, texts, logos and images on the fly. Free plan includes 30 generated images per month and 3 image templates.
https://efemarai.com - Testing and debugging platform for ML models and data. Visualize any computational graph. Free 30 debugging sessions per month for developers.
https://www.einblick.ai/) - a modern data science platform that brings Python notebooks to a collaborative canvas and includes tools that automate common tasks such as building predictive models (AutoML - a modern data science platform that brings Python notebooks to a collaborative canvas and includes tools that automate common tasks such as building predictive models (AutoML) or comparing populations. Free tier includes 5 canvases and unlimited collaborators.
https://extendsclass.com/rest-client-online.html - Free web-based HTTP client to send HTTP requests.
https://exportsdk.com - - PDF generator API with drag and drop template editor that also provides an SDK and no-code integrations. Free plan comes with 250 pages per month, unlimited users and three templates.
https://file.coffee/) - A platform where you can store up to 15MB/file (30/MB file with an account - A platform where you can store up to 15MB/file (30/MB file with an account).
https://flatironsdevelopment.com/products/fuse/ - - An embeddable CSV and spreadsheet import tool that makes importing data to your website fast, easy, and painless.
https://www.fraudlabspro.com - — Screen an order transaction for credit card payment fraud. This REST API will detect all possible fraud traits based on the input parameters of an order. Free Micro plan has 500 transactions per month.
https://freegeoip.app/) - Completely free Geo IP information (JSON, CSV, XML - Completely free Geo IP information (JSON, CSV, XML). No registration required, 15000 queries per hour rate limit.
https://geekflare.com/api - - Geekflare API let you take screenshots, audit websites, TLS scan, DNS lookup, test TTFB, and a lot more. The free plan offers 3000 API requests.
https://geocod.xyz) — Free geocoding API: Convert postal addresses into geographic coordinates or convert geographic coordinates into postal addresses (reverse geocoding - Free geocoding API: Convert postal addresses into geographic coordinates or convert geographic coordinates into postal addresses (reverse geocoding).
https://www.geodatasource.com - Location search service lookup for city name by using latitude and longitude coordinate. Free API queries up to 500 times per month.
https://glitterly.app/ - Programatically generate dynamic images from base templates. Restful API and nocode integrations. Free tier comes with 50 images/month and 5 templates.
https://www.gooddata.com/ - Data as a Service - Create interactive and insightful dashboards. Free tier comes with 5 workspaces and 100 MB/workspace.
https://hex.tech/ - a collaborative data platform for notebooks, data apps and knowledge libraries. Free community version with up to 3 authors and 5 projects. One compute profile per author with 4GB RAM.
https://hookbin.com/) - Create unique (public or private - Create unique (public or private) endpoints to collect, parse, and inspect HTTP requests. Inspect headers, body, query strings, cookies, uploaded files, etc. Useful for testing/inspecting webhook. Similar to RequestBin, and Webhook.site.
https://hoppscotch.io - A free, fast, and beautiful API request builder.
https://hybiscus.dev/ - Build pdf reports using a simple declarative API. Free tier includes upto 100 single page reports per month with the ability to customise color pallet and fonts.
https://cloud.invantive.com/) — Access over 70 (cloud)platforms such as Exact Online, Twinfield, ActiveCampaign or Visma using Invantive SQL or OData4 (typically Power BI or Power Query - — Access over 70 (cloud)platforms such as Exact Online, Twinfield, ActiveCampaign or Visma using Invantive SQL or OData4 (typically Power BI or Power Query). Includes data replication and exchange. Free plan for developers and implementation consultants. Free for specific platforms with limitations in data volumes.
https://about.ipaddress.sh/ - Simple service to get public IP address in different [formats](https://about.ipaddress.sh/).
https://iploka.com/ - IP to Geolocation API - Forever free plan for developers with 10k requests per month limit.
https://ipgeolocation.io/) — IP Geolocation API - Forever free plan for developers with 30k requests per month (1k/day - — IP Geolocation API - Forever free plan for developers with 30k requests per month (1k/day) limit.
https://www.abstractapi.com/ip-geolocation-api - API](https://www.abstractapi.com/ip-geolocation-api) — IP Geolocation API from Abstract - Extensive free plan allowing 20,000 requests per month.
https://www.ip2location.com - Freemium IP geolocation service. LITE database is available for free download. Import the database in server and perform local query to determine city, coordinates and ISP information.
https://www.ip2location.io/ - Freemium, fast and reliable IP geolocation API to determine geolocation data like city, coordinates, ISP and so on. Free plan is available with 30k credits per month. Subscribe paid plans for more advanced features or contact us for a personalized plan.
https://ipapi.co/) - IP Address Location API by Kloudend, Inc - A reliable geolocation API, built on AWS, trusted by Fortune 500. Free tier offers 30k lookups/month (1k/day - IP Address Location API by Kloudend, Inc - A reliable geolocation API, built on AWS, trusted by Fortune 500. Free tier offers 30k lookups/month (1k/day) without signup. Contact us for a higher limit trial plan.
https://ipinfo.io/) — Fast, accurate, and free (up to 50k/month - Fast, accurate, and free (up to 50k/month) IP address data API. Offers APIs with details on geolocation, companies, carriers, IP ranges, domains, abuse contacts, and more. All paid APIs can be trialed for free.
https://www.iplist.cc - Lookup details about any IP address, such as Geo IP information, tor addresses, hostnames and ASN details. Free for personal and business users.
https://www.bigdatacloud.com/) - Provides fast, accurate and free (Unlimited or up to 10K-50K/month - Provides fast, accurate and free (Unlimited or up to 10K-50K/month) APIs for modern web like IP Geolocation, Reverse Geocoding, Networking Insights, Email and Phone Validation, Client Info and more.
https://iptrace.io - An embarrassingly simple API that provides reliable and useful IP geolocation data for your business.
https://json2video.com - A video editing API to automate video marketing and social media videos, programmatically or with no-code.
https://getjsonip.com - — Returns the Public IP address of the client it is requested from. No registration required for free tier. Using CORS data can be requested using client side JS directly from browser. Useful for services monitoring change in client and server IPs. Unlimited Requests.
https://konghq.com/ - API Marketplace and powerful tools for private and public APIs. With the free tier, some features are limited such as monitoring, alerting and support.
https://kreya.app - Free gRPC GUI client to call and test gRPC APIs. Can import gRPC APIs via server reflection.
https://www.lightly.ai/ - Improve your machine learning models by using the right data. Use datasets of up to 1'000 samples for free.

https://pika.style/templates/code-image - Screenshots](https://pika.style/templates/code-image) — Create beautiful, customizable screenshots from code snippets and VSCode using extension.
https://quicktype.io/ - Quickly auto generate models/class/type/interface and serializers from JSON, schema, and GraphQL for working with data quickly & safely in any programming language. Convert JSON into gorgeous, typesafe code in any language.
https://randomkeygen.com/ - A free mobile-friendly tool offers a variety of randomly generated keys and passwords you can use to secure any application, service or device.
https://ray.so/ - Create beautiful images of your code snippets.
https://readme.com/ - Beautiful documentation made easy, free for Open Source.
https://redirection.io/ - SaaS tool for managing HTTP redirections for businesses, marketing and SEO.
https://redirect.pizza/ - Easily manage redirects with HTTPS support. Free plan includes 10 sources and 100.000 hits per month.
https://www.reqbin.com/ - Post HTTP Requests Online. Popular Request Methods include GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, and HEAD. Supports Headers and Token Authentication. Includes a basic login system for saving your requests.
https://smartcar.com - - An API for cars to locate, get fuel tank, battery levels, odometer, unlock/lock doors, etc.
https://sunrisesunset.io/api/ - Sunset](https://sunrisesunset.io/api/) - Get sunrise and sunset times for a given longitude and latitude.
https://superfeedr.com/ - Real-time PubSubHubbub compliant feeds, export, analytics. Free with less customization
https://www.surveymonkey.com - Create online surveys. Analyze the results online. Free plan allows only 10 questions and 100 responses per survey.
https://tiledesk.com) - Create chatbots and conversational apps. Bring them omnichannel: from your website (live chat widget - Create chatbots and conversational apps. Bring them omnichannel: from your website (live chat widget) to WhatsApp. Free plan with unlimited chatbots.
https://versionfeeds.com) — Custom RSS feeds for releases of your favorite software. Have the latest versions of your programming languages, libraries or loved tools in one feed. (First 3 feeds are free - Custom RSS feeds for releases of your favorite software. Have the latest versions of your programming languages, libraries or loved tools in one feed. (First 3 feeds are free)
https://videoinu.com - Create and edit screen recordings and other videos online.
https://getscreen.me - Free for 2 devices, no limits on the number and duration of sessions
https://guacamole.apache.org/ - — Open source clientless remote desktop gateway
https://remsupp.com) — On-demand support and permanent access to devices (2 sessions/day for free - On-demand support and permanent access to devices (2 sessions/day for free)
https://rustdesk.com/ - Open source virtual / remote desktop infrastructure for everyone!
https://itch.io/game-assets - Free/Paid assets like sprites, tile sets, character packs, ...
https://gamefresco.com/ - Discover, collect and share free game assets from game artists everywhere.
https://gamedevmarket.net - Free/Paid assets like 2D, 3D, Audio, GUI.
https://opengameart.org - OpenSource Game Assets like music, sounds, sprites, gifs, ...
https://craftpix.net - Free/Paid assets like 2D, 3D, Audio, GUI, backgrounds, icons, tile sets, game kits.
https://game-icons.net/ - - Free styleable SVG/PNG icons provided under CC-BY license.
https://lospec.com/ - Online tools for creating pixel art and other restrictive digital art, lots of tutorials/pallet list available to choose for your games
https://www.artstation.com/ - MarketPlace for Free/Paid 2D, 3D assets & audios, icons, tile sets, game kits,..., Also, It can be used for showcasing your art portfolio.
https://rive.app/community/ - Community assets as well as create your own game assets using its free plan.
https://poly.pizza/ - - Free low poly 3D assets
https://www.3dassets.one/ - Over 8,000 free/paid 3D models, and PBR materials for making textures.
https://www.3dmodelscc0.com/ - Library of public domain 3D models made for game development.
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/) - Free (CC0 1.0 Universal licensed - Free (CC0 1.0 Universal licensed) 2D, 3D, Audio, and UI game assets.
https://get.localhost.direct - A better `*.localhost.direct` Wildcard public CA signed SSL cert for localhost development with sub-domain support
https://framasoft.org/en/ - A list of Free/Libre Open Source Software and SaaS by the French non-profit [Framasoft](https://framasoft.org/en/).
https://github.com/tvvocold/FOSS-for-Dev - FOSS for Dev](https://github.com/tvvocold/FOSS-for-Dev) — A hub of free and Open Source software for developers.
https://education.github.com/pack - — Collection of free services for students. Registration required.
https://www.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/enterprise/e5) (Windows excluded) which is renewable. It is renewed if you're active in development(measured using telemetry data & algorithms - Developer Program](https://developer.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/dev-program) — Get a free sandbox, tools, and other resources you need to build solutions for the Microsoft 365 platform. The subscription is a 90-day [Microsoft 365 E5 Subscription](https://www.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/enterprise/e5) (Windows excluded) which is renewable. It is renewed if you're active in development(measured using telemetry data & algorithms).
https://developers.redhat.com - Developers](https://developers.redhat.com) — Free access to Red Hat products including RHEL,OpenShift,CodeReady etc exclusively for developers. Individual plan only. Free e-Books also offered for reference.
https://smsreceivefree.com/ - Provides free temporary and disposable phone numbers.
https://simplebackups.io/) — Backup automation service for servers and databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB) stored directly into cloud storage providers (AWS, DigitalOcean, Backblaze... - Backup automation service for servers and databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB) stored directly into cloud storage providers (AWS, DigitalOcean, Backblaze...). Provides free plan for 1 backup.
https://snapshooter.com/ - Backup solution for DigitalOcean, AWS, LightSail, Hetzner and Exoscale, with support for direct database, file system and application backups to s3 based storage. Provides a free plan with daily backups for one resource.
https://themeselection.com/ - Selected high quality, modern design, professional and easy-to-use Free Admin Dashboard Template,
https://web.dev/measure/ - This is a free tool that allows you to see the performance of your website and improve the SEO to get higher rank list in search engines.
https://www.setools.xyz/ - This website provide free tools for developers and everyone. We are having tools like base64 encoder, URL Encoder, character counter, SHA256, MD5 Hash.
https://smalldev.tools/ - A free tool for developers that allows you to Encode/Decode various formats, Minify HTML/CSS/Javascript, Beautify, Generate Fake/Testing real like dataset in JSON/CSV & multiple other formats and many more features. With a delightful interface.
https://layercode.com/usecsv - Layercode](https://layercode.com/usecsv) — Add CSV and Excel import to your web app in minutes. Give your users an enjoyable and robust data import experience. Get Started for Free without any credit card details, and start integrating UseCSV today. You can create unlimited Importers and upload files up to 100Mb.
https://markodenic.com/tools/buttons-generator/ - — 100+ buttons you can use in your project.
https://www.wrappixel.com/ - Download High Quality Free and Premium Admin dashboard template created with Angular, React, VueJs, NextJs and NuxtJs!
https://utils.fun/en - All offline daily and development tools based on the browser's computing power, including watermark generation, screen recording, encoding and decoding, encryption and decryption and code formatting, are completely free and do not upload any data to the cloud for processing.
https://qr-code-robot.com) — Free QR Code Generator. Offers possibilty to generate a QR Code for a webpage, sms, email, wifi auth or free text. Plans to offer also a generator for file sharing (pdf, mp3, video - Robot](https://qr-code-robot.com) — Free QR Code Generator. Offers possibilty to generate a QR Code for a webpage, sms, email, wifi auth or free text. Plans to offer also a generator for file sharing (pdf, mp3, video) and also a scan tracking of QR code.
https://freecodetools.org/ - Tools](https://freecodetools.org/) — Effective code tools which are 100% free. Markdown editor, Code minifier/beautifier, QR code generator, Open Graph Generator, Twitter card Generator and more.
https://regex101.com/) — Free this website allows you to test and debug regular expressions (regex - Free this website allows you to test and debug regular expressions (regex). It provides a regex editor and tester, as well as helpful documentation and resources for learning regex.
https://www.kodytools.com/dev-tools - — 100+ dev tools including formatter, minifier, and converter.

https://chiselapp.com/ - Unlimited public and private Fossil repositories

https://gitgud.io - Unlimited private and public repositories. Free forever. Powered by GitLab & Sapphire. CI/CD not provided.
https://github.com/) — Unlimited public repositories and unlimited private repositories (with unlimited collaborators). Apart from this some other free services(there are much more but we list the main ones here - Unlimited public repositories and unlimited private repositories (with unlimited collaborators). Apart from this some other free services(there are much more but we list the main ones here) provided are :
https://github.com/features/actions)(Free for Public Repos, 2000 min/month for private repos free - Public Repos, 2000 min/month for private repos free)

https://pages.github.com) (Free for Public Repos - Hosting](https://pages.github.com) (Free for Public Repos)
https://github.com/features/packages) (Free for public repos,500 MB storage & 1GB bandwidth outside CI/CD free for private repos - & Container Registry](https://github.com/features/packages) (Free for public repos,500 MB storage & 1GB bandwidth outside CI/CD free for private repos)
https://about.gitlab.com/ - Unlimited public and private Git repos with up to 5 collaborators. Also offers the following features :
https://about.gitlab.com/product/continuous-integration) (Free for Public Repos, 400 mins/month for private repos - for Public Repos, 400 mins/month for private repos)
https://about.gitlab.com/product/pages - with [GitLab Pages](https://about.gitlab.com/product/pages).
https://foss.heptapod.net/ - Heptapod is a friendly fork of GitLab Community Edition providing support for Mercurial
https://ionicframework.com/appflow - Repo and tools to develop applications with Ionic, also you have an ionic repo
https://notabug.org - NotABug.org is a free-software code collaboration platform for freely licensed projects, Git-based
https://osdn.net/ - OSDN.net is a free-of-charge service for open source software developers, offering SVN/Git/Mercurial/Bazaar/CVS repositories and more.
https://pagure.io - Pagure.io is a free and open source software code collaboration platform for FOSS-licensed projects, Git-based
https://www.perforce.com/products/helix-teamhub - Free 1GB Cloud and Git, Mercurial, or SVN repositories.
https://pijul.com/ - Unlimited free and open source distributed version control system. Its distinctive feature is to be based on a sound theory of patches, which makes it easy to learn and use, and really distributed. Solves many problems of git/hg/svn/darcs.
https://plasticscm.com/ - Free for individuals, OSS and nonprofit organizations
https://projectlocker.com) — One free private project (Git and Subversion - One free private project (Git and Subversion) with 50 MB space
https://rocketgit.com - Repository Hosting based on Git. Unlimited Public & Private repositories.

https://savannah.nongnu.org/) - Serves as a collaborative software development management system for free Software projects (for non-GNU projects - Serves as a collaborative software development management system for free Software projects (for non-GNU projects)
https://ip.city - 100 free IP geolocation requests per day
https://a11ywatch.com - Powerful web accessibility tool at scale. Free site-wide web acessibility testing and beyond that resets daily.
https://www.abstractapi.com - — API suite for a variety of use cases including IP geolocation, gender detection or even email validation.
https://algorithmia.com/ - Host algorithms for free. Includes free monthly allowance for running algorithms. Now with CLI support.
https://www.apify.com/ - Web scraping and automation platform to create an API for any website and extract data. Ready-made scrapers, integrated proxies, and custom solutions. Free plan with $5 platform credits included every month.
https://apimocha.com - - Completely free online API mocking for testing and prototyping. Make up to 500 requests per day, fully customizable API responses, download mock rules as a Postman collection.
https://apitemplate.io - Auto-generate images and PDF documents with a simple API or automation tools like Zapier & Airtable. No CSS/HTML required. Free plan comes with 50 images/month and 3 templates.
https://arize.com/ - - Machine learning observability for model monitoring and root-causing issues such as data quality and performance drift. Free up to two models.
https://atlastk.org/ - - Lightweight library to develop single-page web applications that are instantly accessible. Available for Java, Node.js, Perl, Python and Ruby.
https://beeceptor.com) - Mock a rest API in seconds, fake API response and much more. Free 50 requests per day, public dashboard, open endpoints (anyone having link to the dashboard can view requests and responses - Mock a rest API in seconds, fake API response and much more. Free 50 requests per day, public dashboard, open endpoints (anyone having link to the dashboard can view requests and responses).
https://bigml.com/ - Hosted machine learning algorithms. Unlimited free tasks for development, limit of 16 MB data/task.
https://bruzu.com/ - Automate Image production. Generate tons of Image variants with API, Integrations or nocode sheet. API is FREE with watermark.
https://calendarific.com - Enterprise-grade Public holiday API service for over 200 countries. Free plan includes 1000 calls per month.
https://www.clarifai.com - Image API for custom face recognition and detection. Able to train AI models. Free plan has 5000 calls per month.
https://cloudmersive.com/ - Utility API platform with full access to expansive API Library including Document Conversion, Virus Scanning, and more with 800 calls/month.
https://colab.research.google.com - Free web-based Python notebook environment with Nvidia Tesla K80 GPU.
https://collect2.com - Create an API endpoint to test, automate, and connect webhooks. Free plan allows for two datasets, 2000 records, 1 forwarder, and 1 alert.
https://conversiontools.io/) - Online File Converter for documents, images, video, audio, eBooks. REST API is available. Libraries for Node.js, PHP, Python. Support files up to 50 GB (for paid plans - - Online File Converter for documents, images, video, audio, eBooks. REST API is available. Libraries for Node.js, PHP, Python. Support files up to 50 GB (for paid plans). Free tier is limited by file size and number of conversions per day.
https://www.coupler.io/ - Data integration tool that syncs between apps. It can create live dashboards and reports, transform and manipulate values, collect and back up insights. The free plan has unlimited users, 100 runs with 1000 rows a month and unlimited integrations.
https://craftmypdf.com - Auto-Generate PDF documents from reusable templates with a drop-and-drop editor and a simple API. Free plan comes with 100 PDFs/month and 3 templates.
https://curlhub.io - Proxy service for inspecting and debugging API calls. Free plan includes 10,000 requests per month.
https://currencyscoop.com - Realtime currency data API for fintech apps. Free plan includes 5000 calls per month.
https://cube.dev/ - Cube helps data engineers and application developers access data from modern data stores, organize it into consistent definitions, and deliver it to every application. The fastest way to use Cube is with Cube Cloud, which has a free-tier with 1GB of data pass through each month.
https://datafetcher.com - - Connect Airtable to any application or API with no-code. Postman-like interface for running API requests in Airtable. Pre-built integrations with dozens of apps. The free plan includes 100 runs per month.
https://www.dataimporter.io - Tool for connecting, cleaning, and importing data into Salesforce. Free Plan includes up to 20,000 records per month.
https://datalore.jetbrains.com - Python notebooks by Jetbrains. Includes 10 GB of storage and 120 hours of runtime each month.
https://dataminer.io/) - A browser extension (Google Chrome, MS Edge - - A browser extension (Google Chrome, MS Edge) for data extraction from web pages CSV or Excel. The free plan gives you 500 pages/month.
https://datapane.com - API for building interactive reports in Python and deploying Python scripts and Jupyter Notebooks as self-service tools.
https://db-ip.com/api/free - Free IP geolocation API with 1k request per IP per day.lite database under CC-BY 4.0 License is free too.
https://www.dbdesigner.net/ - — Cloud based Database schema design and modeling tool with a free starter plan of 2 Database models and 10 tables per model.
https://developer.deepar.ai) — Augmented reality face filters for any platform with one SDK. Free plan provides up to 10 monthly active users (MAU - Augmented reality face filters for any platform with one SDK. Free plan provides up to 10 monthly active users (MAU) and tracking up to 4 faces
https://deepnote.com - A new kind of data science notebook. Jupyter-compatible with real-time collaboration and running in the cloud. Free tier includes unlimited personal projects, up to 750 hours of standard hardware and teams with up to 3 editors.
https://www.diggernaut.com/ - Cloud based web scraping and data extraction platform for turning any website to the dataset or to work with it as with an API. Free plan includes 5K page requests monthly.
https://disease.sh/ - A free API providing accurate data for building the Covid-19 related useful Apps.
https://dreamfactory.com/ - Open source REST API backend for mobile, web, and IoT applications. Hook up any SQL/NoSQL database, file storage system, or external service and it instantly creates a comprehensive REST API platform with live documentation, user management,...
https://advicement.io - Generate PDF documents with JSON to PDF API based on LaTeX templates. Free plan allows 50 API calls per month and access to a library of templates.
https://dynapictures.com - Design automation tool which lets you dynamically generate images over REST API. Change colors, texts, logos and images on the fly. Free plan includes 30 generated images per month and 3 image templates.
https://efemarai.com - Testing and debugging platform for ML models and data. Visualize any computational graph. Free 30 debugging sessions per month for developers.
https://www.einblick.ai/) - a modern data science platform that brings Python notebooks to a collaborative canvas and includes tools that automate common tasks such as building predictive models (AutoML - a modern data science platform that brings Python notebooks to a collaborative canvas and includes tools that automate common tasks such as building predictive models (AutoML) or comparing populations. Free tier includes 5 canvases and unlimited collaborators.
https://extendsclass.com/rest-client-online.html - Free web-based HTTP client to send HTTP requests.
https://exportsdk.com - - PDF generator API with drag and drop template editor that also provides an SDK and no-code integrations. Free plan comes with 250 pages per month, unlimited users and three templates.
https://file.coffee/) - A platform where you can store up to 15MB/file (30/MB file with an account - A platform where you can store up to 15MB/file (30/MB file with an account).
https://flatironsdevelopment.com/products/fuse/ - - An embeddable CSV and spreadsheet import tool that makes importing data to your website fast, easy, and painless.
https://www.fraudlabspro.com - — Screen an order transaction for credit card payment fraud. This REST API will detect all possible fraud traits based on the input parameters of an order. Free Micro plan has 500 transactions per month.
https://freegeoip.app/) - Completely free Geo IP information (JSON, CSV, XML - Completely free Geo IP information (JSON, CSV, XML). No registration required, 15000 queries per hour rate limit.
https://geekflare.com/api - - Geekflare API let you take screenshots, audit websites, TLS scan, DNS lookup, test TTFB, and a lot more. The free plan offers 3000 API requests.
https://geocod.xyz) — Free geocoding API: Convert postal addresses into geographic coordinates or convert geographic coordinates into postal addresses (reverse geocoding - Free geocoding API: Convert postal addresses into geographic coordinates or convert geographic coordinates into postal addresses (reverse geocoding).
https://www.geodatasource.com - Location search service lookup for city name by using latitude and longitude coordinate. Free API queries up to 500 times per month.
https://glitterly.app/ - Programatically generate dynamic images from base templates. Restful API and nocode integrations. Free tier comes with 50 images/month and 5 templates.
https://www.gooddata.com/ - Data as a Service - Create interactive and insightful dashboards. Free tier comes with 5 workspaces and 100 MB/workspace.
